"Xitrae": "Testing, testing! Can you hear me? I'm speaking to <%me>, right?"
"Sorry for calling you out of the blue like this. I'm Xitrae, the head of ARKS' Supply Corps."
"<%me>! Long time no see! You remember me, right?"
"Xitrae, head of the ARKS Supply Corps, remember?"
"I'm dealing with a bit of a problem, you see, and I could really use your help..."
"If that's alright with you, could you come see me?"
